data.Title: Leader
data.ResultDisplayText: You like to lead other people and are good at taking control of situations.

data.Title: Driver
data.ResultDisplayText: You are motivated, set yourself personal goals and are comfortable competing with other people.

data.Title: Organiser
data.ResultDisplayText: You like to plan things and are well organised.

data.Title: Analyst
data.ResultDisplayText: You like dealing with complicated problems or working with numbers.

data.Title: Creator
data.ResultDisplayText: You are a creative person and enjoy coming up with new ways of doing things.

data.Title: Influencer
data.ResultDisplayText: You are sociable and find it easy to understand people.

data.Title: Doer
data.ResultDisplayText: You are a practical person and enjoy gettings things done.

data.Title: Helper
data.ResultDisplayText: You enjoy helping and listening to other people.

data.QuestionText: I am comfortable telling people what they need to do
I make decisions quickly
I like to take control of situations
I prefer to follow what other people are doing
I like taking responsibility for other people
I set myself targets when I have things to do, and usually meet them
I like to see things through to the end
I think I am a competitive person
Doing well in a career motivates me
I set myself goals in life
I am comfortable talking people around to my way of thinking
I am good at coming to an agreement with other people
I am comfortable talking in front of a group of people
I like meeting new people
I find it hard to understand other people's point of view
I like to help other people
I enjoy working with other people around me
I want to make things better for people
I will get involved if I think I can help
I am comfortable hearing other people's problems
I like to work out complicated things
I like to get to the centre of the issue
I like working with facts
I like working with numbers
I enjoy learning new things
I enjoy coming up with new ways of doing things
I try to think differently to others
I like to use my imagination to create new things
I like to try new things
I enjoy creative activities
I like to focus on details
I plan my day so I can use my time best
I like doing things in a careful order
I like to follow rules and processes
I feel restricted when I have to follow a routine
I like to see the results of the work I do
I like to get involved in making things
I enjoy getting involved in practical tasks
I like working with my hands or tools
I enjoy planning a task more than actually doing it

Data.Title: active learning
Data.QuestionText: Do you enjoy learning new things?

Values: active learning

Data.Title: adaptability/flexibility
Data.QuestionText: Are you comfortable with things changing?

Values: adaptability/flexibility

Data.Title: analytical thinking
Data.QuestionText: Are you comfortable analysing information to solve problems?

Values: analytical thinking

Data.Title: complex problem solving
Data.QuestionText: Do you enjoy solving complicated problems?

Values: complex problem solving

Data.Title: concern for others
Data.QuestionText: Would you be comfortable in a job where you would need to be sensitive to other people's needs and feelings?

Values: concern for others

Data.Title: control movement abilities
Data.QuestionText: Are you able to control your body movements, for example moving both your arms or legs at the same time?

Values: control movement abilities

Data.Title: cooperation
Data.QuestionText: Are you comfortable with working together as a team with other people?

Values: cooperation

Data.Title: coordination
Data.QuestionText: Are you comfortable coordinating things?

Values: coordination

Data.Title: endurance
Data.QuestionText: Do you feel fit enough to do physical exercise for most of the day?

Values: endurance

Data.Title: equipment maintenance
Data.QuestionText: Would you like a job maintaining equipment?

Values: equipment maintenance

Data.Title: fine manipulative abilities
Data.QuestionText: Can you work with your hands to do something fiddly like threading a needle?

Values: fine manipulative abilities

Data.Title: independence
Data.QuestionText: Would you be comfortable working by yourself with no other people?

Values: independence

Values: independence, initiative

Data.QuestionText: Would you be comfortable taking responsibility for things that you did not expect to happen?

Values: initiative

Data.Title: innovation
Data.QuestionText: Do you think you are good at coming up with new ways of doing things?

Values: innovation

Data.Title: installation

Values: operations analysis

Data.Title: persistence

Data.QuestionText: Are you comfortable getting other people to do things?

Data.QuestionText: Would you be comfortable using science to solve problems?

Data.Title: service orientation

Values: service orientation

Data.Title: social orientation
Data.QuestionText: Do you prefer working in a group rather than working on your own?

Values: social orientation

Values: social perceptiveness

Data.Title: speaking, verbal abilities
Data.QuestionText: Are you comfortable talking through things with other people so that they understand?

Values: speaking, verbal abilities

Data.Title: stress tolerance
Data.QuestionText: Do you think you are good at staying calm under pressure?

Values: stress tolerance

Data.Title: systems analysis
Data.QuestionText: Would you like a job where you would need to evaluate how things work for people?

Values: systems analysis

Data.Title: systems analysis, systems evaluation
Data.QuestionText: Would you like a job where you analyse how things work and then recommend how it could be improved?

Values: systems analysis, systems evaluation

Data.Title: systems evaluation
Data.QuestionText: Would you like a job that involved measuring how something was working and suggesting improvements?

Values: systems evaluation

Data.Title: time management
Data.QuestionText: Do you think you are good at managing your time?

Values: time management

Values: troubleshooting

Data.QuestionText: Do you think you are good at using words to describe ideas?

Values: verbal abilities

Data.QuestionText: Do you think you are good at explaining things, either by talking or writing it down?

Values: verbal abilities, speaking

Data.Title: writing
Data.QuestionText: Would you like to write as a main part of your job?

Values: writing

Data.Title: attention to detail
Data.QuestionText: Do you enjoy being thorough and paying attention to details?

Values: attention to detail

Data.Title: critical thinking
Data.QuestionText: Do you enjoy logically weighing up different ways to solve problems?

Values: critical thinking

Data.Title: idea generation and reasoning abilities
Data.QuestionText: Do you think you are good at coming up with lots of different ways to solve problems?

Values: idea generation and reasoning abilities

Data.Title: attentiveness
Data.QuestionText: Are you able to concentrate on on a task for a long time without becoming distracted?

Values: attentiveness

Data.Title: active listening
Data.QuestionText: Do you think you are good at paying attention to what other people are saying, taking the time to understand what they mean?

Values: active listening

Data.Title: equipment selection
Data.QuestionText: Would you like a job that involves deciding which tools or equipment need to be used?

Values: equipment selection

Data.Title: speaking
Data.QuestionText: Are you able to talk people through instructions?

Values: speaking

Data.Title: achievement orientation
Data.QuestionText: Do you enjoy taking on more responsibility for things at work?

Values: achievement orientation

Data.Title: achievement orientation, achievement/effort
Data.QuestionText: Do you like to put in a lot of effort so that you get much better at doing things?

Values: achievement orientation, achievement/effort

Data.Title: adjustment
Data.QuestionText: Do you think you are good at coping with setbacks, stress and pressures at work?

Values: adjustment

Data.Title: adjustment, self control
Data.QuestionText: Are you good at staying calm and professional in difficult situations?

Values: adjustment, self control

Data.Title: cognitive abilities
Data.QuestionText: Are you able to pull together different pieces of information to understand patterns?

Values: cognitive abilities

Data.QuestionText: Would you like a job where you would assess why something is going wrong and working out what to do about it?

Values: cognitive abilities, troubleshooting

Data.Title: complex problem solving skills
Data.QuestionText: Do you think you are good at solving unusual problems that other people find difficult?

Values: complex problem solving skills

Data.QuestionText: Would you be able to identify and research complex problems, and find solutions to them?

Values: complex problem solving skills, complex problem solving

Data.Title: interpersonal orientation
Data.QuestionText: Do you think you are easy to get along with at work?

Values: interpersonal orientation

Data.Title: interpersonal orientation, cooperation
Data.QuestionText: Do you find it easy to build good relationships with people you work with?

Values: interpersonal orientation, cooperation

Data.Title: management of material resources
Data.QuestionText: Would you like a job where you would deal with finding the right equipment and materials to get something done?

Values: management of material resources

Data.Title: physical abilities
Data.QuestionText: Do you consider yourself physically strong and flexible?

Values: physical abilities

Data.Title: physical abilities,endurance
Data.QuestionText: Do you find it easy to do physical exercise for long periods of time without getting out of breath?

Values: physical abilities,endurance

Data.Title: practical intelligence
Data.QuestionText: Do you think you are good at coming up with practical ideas to solve problems?

Values: practical intelligence

Data.Title: psychomotor abilities
Data.QuestionText: Are you able to keep your arms and hands steady?

Values: psychomotor abilities

Data.QuestionText: Could you quickly adjust the controls of a machine or a vehicle?

Values: psychomotor abilities,control movement abilities

Data.Title: resource management skills
Data.QuestionText: Would you like to work in a management role, which could be managing people, money and time?

Values: resource management skills

Data.Title: social influence
Data.QuestionText: Do people tend to follow your lead?

Values: social influence

Data.Title: social skills
Data.QuestionText: Do you think you have good social skills?

Values: social skills

Data.Title: systems skills
Data.QuestionText: Do you think you are able to weigh up whether things are worth spending money on dependant on how much benefit they will have?

Values: systems skills

Data.Title: technical skills
Data.QuestionText: Do you think you have basic technical skills so that you could operate simple tools or machinery?

Values: technical skills

Data.Title: technology design
Data.QuestionText: Would you like a job designing technology?

Values: technology design

Data.Title: reading comprehension
Data.QuestionText: Are you able to read well?

Values: reading comprehension
